text: صِبۡغَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ صِبۡغَةٗۖ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُۥ عَٰبِدُونَ

translation.en: [And say, "Ours is] the religion of Allah. And who is better than Allah in [ordaining] religion? And we are worshippers of Him
translation.id: (Ṣibgah Allah"46) Siapa yang lebih baik ṣibgah-nya daripada Allah? Dan kepada-Nya kami menyembah
